excerpt.rendered:
The Next 620 (occasion)

TECHNICAL DATA

The Next 620 is an aluminum sloop from Alumax Boats in Meppel. The boat is 6,20 meters long and 2,12 meters wide. The draft is 50 centimeters and the vertical clearance is 1.12 meters. The aluminum boat is equipped with a 3=1.5KW Combi-outboard motor and 400 Amp/h traction package.

The Next 620 pictured is one of our 2022 demo boats. The motor has been recently rebuilt so no – to few hours of operation.

EQUIPPED WITH
  1. LED navigation lights red/green, 360 degree removable white light and 12 volt plug;
  2. Complete cushion set of Sunbrella;
  3. Cushion on engine box;
  4. Sunbed with wooden bottom;
  5. Bimini top with aluminum fram;
  6. Waterproof cover for the console;
  7. Removable table;
  8. Dry toilet;
  9. Stainless steel swim ladder;
  10. Aluminum flagpole holder with wooden flagpole and NL flag;
  11. Wrapped hull;
  12. STAZO anti-theft lock;
  13. Fender package;
  14. 3.5KW combination outboard motor and 400 Amp/h traction package.
STANDARD EQUIPMENT

Knuckle bilge with keel, self-draining checker plate floor, double bottom, foredeck with hatch and door (e.g. space for a toilet) and two aluminum bollards, two benches in the front of the boat, steering console and ventilated battery compartment, rear bench with storage space and floating side benches, aft deck with lockable hatch to the engine bunk, small swimming platforms at the rear, trailer eye in the bow bow and an anode on the underwater ship.

All hatches are fitted with latches, hinges and discharge chutes. The entire boat is welded from seawater-resistant aluminum and is delivered with owner’s manual and CE mark. Standard equipped with 1.5KW electric motor, top mount throttle, steering by mono cable control system, Trojan battery pack á 360 Amp/h incl. 24 Volt / 20 Amp for five hours of sailing pleasure.

Would you rather have a new The Next 620 built? Click here

Is this your dream boat? Get in touch!
